message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 70/30 seems fair considering the devaluation.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  It reflects the devaluation over time, but still gives us a good chunk.
Bob, time is running out, especially for you. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is my final offer.
